title: Group portrait of men and women, including left to right; Mrs. Govan Martin, Monsignor Paul Bossompierre, Mrs. Earl Watson, Andrew Talley, James Humbert, singer Molly Johnson Lewis, Bishop John Wright in center, Cynthia Ivey, Bishop Vincent Leonard, Martha Gay, Celestine Jones, Leon Blackston, James Sims, and Clarence Singleton, standing in front of Horace and Mary Turner's Combo band, for talent show for 75th Anniversary Celebration at St .Benedict the Moor Roman Catholic Church
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
